Learning resources

Source: vignettes/resources.Rmd
resources.Rmd

Introduction

One of the best resources to learn about functionality afforded by easystats package is to read the dedicated websites for each package. A lot of love and work has gone into writing detailed function documentation and vignettes for these websites and we will highly recommend you check them out.

But, we are certainly not the only ones talking about them, and below are some other resources that might be helpful for you to learn about easystats packages.

YouTube videos

{performance} package:

  • Package review (Yury Zablotski)

  • easystats: Quickly investigate model performance

{report} package:

  • Automate Textual Reports of Statistical Models in R!

Blog post / websites

{modelbased} package:

  • modelbased for Quick and Beautiful Model Visualization

Presentations

{bayestestR} package:

  • Evaluating Evidence and Making Decisions using Bayesian Statistics (Mattan S. Ben-Shachar)

{modelbased} package:

  • Introduction into predictions and the {modelbased} package

  • Contrasts and Pairwise Comparisons

On this page
